MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the FK2 postcode area of Polmont. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown between 09:00am and 9:15am. This is to safely carry out repair work to a damaged electrical equipment on our overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:15am on Saturday, 17 April 2021
